marketplaces.name: ruby-on-rails-marketplace

files.README.md:
# Ruby on Rails Marketplace

A Claude Code plugin marketplace for Ruby on Rails developers.

## Install

```bash
claude marketplace add ogirginc/ruby-on-rails-marketplace
```

## Plugins

- **heal-schema** - Fix orphaned migrations and schema.rb issues

plugins.name: heal-schema
plugins.description: Adds a /heal-schema command for fixing schema issues
